components: VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL,ELECTRONIC STABILITY CONTROL,SERVICE BRAKES
summary: THE CAMERA THAT CONTROLS THE AUTOMATIC BREAKING SYSTEM AS WELL AS THE LANE WARNINGS KEEPS SAYING THERE IS AN OBSTRUCTION BUT THERE ISN'T ONE. I OWNED THE VEHICLE ABOUT 1 HOUR WHEN THE WARNING LIGHT APPEARED AND THEY SAID IT WAS A SIMPLE SOFTWARE UPDATE BUT NOW THEY ARE SAYING IT NEEDS A NEW SENSOR. I WANT TO RETURN THE CAR BUT I AM IN NH WHERE THERE IS NO COOLING OFF PERIOD. I AM AFRAID THIS IS GOING TO BE AN ONGOING ISSUE AFTER READING HERE, PLEASE ADVISE
